U.S.<Deli>O Democratic<Deli>O Party<Deli>O Congressman<Deli>B-TARGET Tony<Deli>O Hall<Deli>O left<Deli>B-TARGET here<Deli>O Thursday<Deli>B-TARGET after<Deli>B-TARGET concluding<Deli>B-TARGET his<Deli>O landmark<Deli>O visit<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>B-TARGET Iraq<Deli>O ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O has<Deli>O been<Deli>O under<Deli>O sweeping<Deli>O U.N.<Deli>O sanctions<Deli>B-TARGET since<Deli>O 1990<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Thoughts<Deli>O about<Deli>O Security<Deli>O of<Deli>O Principal<Deli>O Squads<Deli>O 
Praise<Deli>B-TARGET Allah<Deli>O who<Deli>O said<Deli>B-TARGET provide<Deli>B-TARGET those<Deli>O who<Deli>O believed<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O security<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O peace<Deli>O be<Deli>O upon<Deli>B-TARGET our<Deli>O prophet<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O enemy<Deli>O confronting<Deli>B-TARGET our<Deli>O society<Deli>O falls<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>B-TARGET three<Deli>B-TARGET categories<Deli>O :<Deli>O 1-<Deli>O Hostile<Deli>O intelligence<Deli>O organizations<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O such<Deli>O as<Deli>O the<Deli>O United<Deli>O States<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Saudi<Deli>O Arabia<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Egypt<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Pakistan<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O Jews<Deli>O 2-<Deli>O The<Deli>O straying<Deli>O group<Deli>B-TARGET who<Deli>O are<Deli>O atheists<Deli>O and<Deli>O apostates<Deli>O 3-<Deli>O The<Deli>O existing<Deli>O environment<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
They<Deli>O include<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O deposed<Deli>B-TARGET regime<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O tribal<Deli>O cliques<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O hired<Deli>B-TARGET fighters<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O standard<Deli>O criminals<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O above<Deli>O groups<Deli>B-TARGET pose<Deli>O the<Deli>O following<Deli>O dangers<Deli>O :<Deli>O 1-<Deli>O Attacking<Deli>B-TARGET for<Deli>O the<Deli>O purpose<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O :<Deli>O A<Deli>O :<Deli>O Assassination<Deli>B-TARGET B<Deli>O :<Deli>O Kidnapping<Deli>B-TARGET C<Deli>O :<Deli>O Aerial<Deli>O raids<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O artillery<Deli>O attacks<Deli>B-TARGET 2-<Deli>O Sabotage<Deli>B-TARGET A<Deli>O :<Deli>O Setting<Deli>O fires<Deli>O B<Deli>O :<Deli>O Explosions<Deli>O C<Deli>O :<Deli>O Technical<Deli>O sabotage<Deli>B-TARGET D<Deli>O :<Deli>O Chemical<Deli>O sabotage<Deli>B-TARGET 3-<Deli>O Spying<Deli>O A<Deli>O :<Deli>O Recruiting<Deli>O a<Deli>O member<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O society<Deli>O B<Deli>O :<Deli>O Planting<Deli>B-TARGET a<Deli>O mole<Deli>O within<Deli>O society<Deli>O C<Deli>O :<Deli>O Spying<Deli>O surveillance<Deli>B-TARGET operation<Deli>O 4-<Deli>O Stealing<Deli>B-TARGET 5-<Deli>O Pests<Deli>O :<Deli>O A<Deli>O :<Deli>O Poisonous<Deli>B-TARGET such<Deli>O as<Deli>O snakes<Deli>O and<Deli>O scorpions<Deli>O B<Deli>O :<Deli>O Harmful<Deli>O such<Deli>O as<Deli>O rats<Deli>O and<Deli>O cockroaches<Deli>O C<Deli>O :<Deli>O Sickening<Deli>B-TARGET such<Deli>O as<Deli>O mosquitoes<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O order<Deli>O to<Deli>O face<Deli>O these<Deli>O dangers<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O we<Deli>O resort<Deli>O to<Deli>O a<Deli>O plan<Deli>B-TARGET which<Deli>O includes<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O external<Deli>O factors<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O internal<Deli>O factors<Deli>O and<Deli>O spying<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
External<Deli>O :<Deli>O All<Deli>B-TARGET actions<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O methods<Deli>B-TARGET adopted<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O confront<Deli>B-TARGET dangers<Deli>B-TARGET from<Deli>B-TARGET outside<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Spying<Deli>O :<Deli>O Confronting<Deli>B-TARGET infiltration<Deli>O operations<Deli>B-TARGET carried<Deli>O out<Deli>O by<Deli>O spying<Deli>O agents<Deli>O or<Deli>O moles<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Chapter<Deli>O One<Deli>O 
External<Deli>O Security<Deli>O 
First<Deli>O :<Deli>O Choosing<Deli>O the<Deli>O Location<Deli>O 
1-<Deli>O Choosing<Deli>B-TARGET mountainous<Deli>O locations<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O preferably<Deli>O 1-3<Deli>O hours<Deli>B-TARGET from<Deli>O main<Deli>B-TARGET cities<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O have<Deli>B-TARGET water<Deli>O resources<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
2-<Deli>O Being<Deli>O close<Deli>O to<Deli>O cities<Deli>B-TARGET is<Deli>O important<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O order<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O have<Deli>B-TARGET important<Deli>B-TARGET services<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
3-<Deli>O If<Deli>O a<Deli>O mountainous<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET is<Deli>O unviable<Deli>O ,<Deli>O then<Deli>O choose<Deli>B-TARGET a<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET next<Deli>O to<Deli>O official<Deli>O buidings<Deli>O so<Deli>O as<Deli>O to<Deli>O avoid<Deli>B-TARGET being<Deli>O bombarded<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
4-<Deli>O Again<Deli>O ,<Deli>O if<Deli>O the<Deli>O above<Deli>O is<Deli>O not<Deli>O possible<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O then<Deli>O choose<Deli>B-TARGET a<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET next<Deli>O to<Deli>O residential<Deli>O areas<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O same<Deli>B-TARGET reason<Deli>O as<Deli>O above<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
5-<Deli>O The<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O away<Deli>O from<Deli>O airports<Deli>O and<Deli>O main<Deli>B-TARGET highways<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
It<Deli>O is<Deli>O preferable<Deli>O it<Deli>O has<Deli>B-TARGET its<Deli>O own<Deli>O private<Deli>O access<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O order<Deli>O to<Deli>O protect<Deli>B-TARGET it<Deli>O and<Deli>O control<Deli>B-TARGET it<Deli>O better<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Second<Deli>O :<Deli>O Protection<Deli>O Methods<Deli>O 
1-<Deli>O Outside<Deli>B-TARGET Protection<Deli>B-TARGET :<Deli>O A<Deli>O :<Deli>O Barriers<Deli>O ,<Deli>O walls<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O parking<Deli>O lots<Deli>O B<Deli>O :<Deli>O Human<Deli>O protection<Deli>B-TARGET :<Deli>O -<Deli>O Patrols<Deli>O close<Deli>O to<Deli>O locations<Deli>B-TARGET -<Deli>O Patrols<Deli>O distant<Deli>B-TARGET from<Deli>O the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET C<Deli>O :<Deli>O Animal<Deli>O protection<Deli>B-TARGET :<Deli>O Dogs<Deli>O D<Deli>O :<Deli>O Electronic<Deli>O protection<Deli>B-TARGET :<Deli>O Cameras<Deli>O ,<Deli>O alarm<Deli>O equipment<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O night<Deli>O vision<Deli>O equipment<Deli>B-TARGET ...<Deli>O etc<Deli>O 
Permanent<Deli>O Protection<Deli>B-TARGET :<Deli>O 
*Barriers<Deli>O 
They<Deli>O are<Deli>O erected<Deli>B-TARGET according<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O nature<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
They<Deli>O can<Deli>O take<Deli>O one<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O following<Deli>O forms<Deli>B-TARGET :<Deli>O 1-<Deli>O Steel<Deli>O pipes<Deli>O :<Deli>O Insert<Deli>B-TARGET 4<Deli>O inch<Deli>O pipes<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O ground<Deli>O at<Deli>B-TARGET 50<Deli>B-TARGET centimeters<Deli>B-TARGET apart<Deli>O and<Deli>O a<Deli>O height<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O one<Deli>B-TARGET meter<Deli>B-TARGET then<Deli>O fill<Deli>B-TARGET them<Deli>O with<Deli>O cement<Deli>O 2-<Deli>O Barrels<Deli>B-TARGET :<Deli>O They<Deli>O are<Deli>O filled<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O cement<Deli>O and<Deli>O place<Deli>B-TARGET around<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O building<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O especially<Deli>O at<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O entrance<Deli>O to<Deli>O prevent<Deli>B-TARGET cars<Deli>B-TARGET from<Deli>O crashing<Deli>B-TARGET into<Deli>O it<Deli>O 3-<Deli>O Ditches<Deli>O :<Deli>O They<Deli>O are<Deli>O better<Deli>B-TARGET than<Deli>O road<Deli>B-TARGET bumps<Deli>O because<Deli>B-TARGET they<Deli>O are<Deli>O harder<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O see<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O ditch<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O 30<Deli>B-TARGET centimeters<Deli>B-TARGET deep<Deli>O and<Deli>O 20<Deli>B-TARGET centimeters<Deli>B-TARGET wide<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Passageways<Deli>O for<Deli>O cars<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O pedestrians<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O designated<Deli>O 4-<Deli>O Road<Deli>B-TARGET bumps<Deli>O :<Deli>O Six<Deli>O successive<Deli>O bumps<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O constructed<Deli>B-TARGET at<Deli>B-TARGET 500<Deli>B-TARGET meters<Deli>B-TARGET from<Deli>O the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O distance<Deli>O between<Deli>O the<Deli>O first<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O fourth<Deli>B-TARGET bump<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O 100<Deli>B-TARGET meters<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O distance<Deli>O between<Deli>O the<Deli>O fourth<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O the<Deli>O sixth<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O 50<Deli>B-TARGET meters<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O so<Deli>O cars<Deli>B-TARGET can<Deli>O not<Deli>O travel<Deli>O fast<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O the<Deli>O direction<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O building<Deli>B-TARGET 5-<Deli>O Barbed<Deli>O Wires<Deli>B-TARGET :<Deli>O They<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O placed<Deli>B-TARGET around<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O building<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O around<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O walls<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O or<Deli>O on<Deli>O top<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O walls<Deli>B-TARGET 6-<Deli>O Nails<Deli>B-TARGET Obstacle<Deli>O :<Deli>O These<Deli>O are<Deli>O placed<Deli>B-TARGET at<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O main<Deli>B-TARGET gate<Deli>O in<Deli>O order<Deli>O to<Deli>O puncture<Deli>O the<Deli>O tires<Deli>O of<Deli>O any<Deli>O car<Deli>B-TARGET crashing<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O 
*Fences<Deli>O 
Fences<Deli>O are<Deli>O the<Deli>O best<Deli>B-TARGET form<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O permanent<Deli>O protection<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
It<Deli>O shields<Deli>B-TARGET off<Deli>O all<Deli>B-TARGET activities<Deli>B-TARGET which<Deli>O take<Deli>O place<Deli>O inside<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O following<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O considered<Deli>B-TARGET when<Deli>B-TARGET erecting<Deli>B-TARGET fences:<Deli>O 
1-<Deli>O The<Deli>O fence<Deli>O which<Deli>O is<Deli>O built<Deli>B-TARGET out<Deli>O of<Deli>O bricks<Deli>O or<Deli>O concrete<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O 4<Deli>B-TARGET meters<Deli>B-TARGET high<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O then<Deli>O topped<Deli>O with<Deli>O one<Deli>B-TARGET meter<Deli>O high<Deli>B-TARGET barbed<Deli>O wire<Deli>B-TARGET fence<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
It<Deli>O is<Deli>O preferable<Deli>O that<Deli>O the<Deli>O barbed<Deli>O wires<Deli>B-TARGET slant<Deli>O outwards<Deli>O at<Deli>O a<Deli>O 70<Deli>O degrees<Deli>O angle<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
2-<Deli>O The<Deli>O thickness<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O fence<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O 60<Deli>B-TARGET cm<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O the<Deli>O distance<Deli>O between<Deli>O it<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O building<Deli>B-TARGET should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O 2<Deli>B-TARGET meters<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
3-<Deli>O Secret<Deli>B-TARGET gates<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O built<Deli>B-TARGET 50<Deli>B-TARGET meters<Deli>B-TARGET apart<Deli>O to<Deli>O be<Deli>O used<Deli>B-TARGET for<Deli>O emergency<Deli>O only<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
However<Deli>O ,<Deli>O they<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET not<Deli>O be<Deli>O identifiable<Deli>O from<Deli>O the<Deli>O outside<Deli>B-TARGET part<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O fence<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
4-<Deli>O It<Deli>O is<Deli>O preferable<Deli>O that<Deli>O any<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET has<Deli>O only<Deli>O 2<Deli>B-TARGET emergency<Deli>O gates<Deli>O and<Deli>O far<Deli>O away<Deli>O from<Deli>O one<Deli>O another<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
5-<Deli>O No<Deli>O other<Deli>B-TARGET outside<Deli>B-TARGET gates<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O erected<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
If<Deli>O it<Deli>O is<Deli>O necessary<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O have<Deli>B-TARGET an<Deli>O outside<Deli>B-TARGET entrance<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O control<Deli>B-TARGET tower<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O then<Deli>O access<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET should<Deli>B-TARGET not<Deli>O be<Deli>O constructed<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
6-<Deli>O If<Deli>O the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET is<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O highly<Deli>O dangerous<Deli>B-TARGET zone<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O then<Deli>O two<Deli>B-TARGET parallel<Deli>O fences<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O built<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O be<Deli>O 3<Deli>B-TARGET meters<Deli>B-TARGET apart<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O space<Deli>O between<Deli>O the<Deli>O two<Deli>B-TARGET fences<Deli>O could<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O mined<Deli>O in<Deli>O order<Deli>O to<Deli>O prevent<Deli>B-TARGET infiltration<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
7-<Deli>O It<Deli>O is<Deli>O preferable<Deli>O the<Deli>O fence<Deli>O be<Deli>O square<Deli>O or<Deli>O rectangular<Deli>O in<Deli>O shape<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
A<Deli>O circular<Deli>B-TARGET shaped<Deli>O fence<Deli>O is<Deli>O harder<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O protect<Deli>O because<Deli>O of<Deli>O hidden<Deli>B-TARGET angles<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Parking:<Deli>O 
Parking<Deli>O areas<Deli>B-TARGET are<Deli>O of<Deli>O importance<Deli>B-TARGET because<Deli>O most<Deli>O sabotage<Deli>O operations<Deli>B-TARGET are<Deli>O done<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O cars<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Therefore<Deli>O ,<Deli>O it<Deli>O is<Deli>O important<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O adopt<Deli>B-TARGET following<Deli>O :<Deli>O 1-<Deli>O The<Deli>O parking<Deli>O lot<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O 50<Deli>B-TARGET meters<Deli>B-TARGET away<Deli>O from<Deli>O the<Deli>O fence<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
If<Deli>O the<Deli>O nature<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O terrain<Deli>O does<Deli>O not<Deli>O allow<Deli>B-TARGET it<Deli>O ,<Deli>O then<Deli>O it<Deli>O should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O other<Deli>B-TARGET side<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O road<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
2-<Deli>O Under<Deli>O no<Deli>O circumstance<Deli>O a<Deli>O car<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O even<Deli>O that<Deli>O which<Deli>O belongs<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O permitted<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O park<Deli>B-TARGET next<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O the<Deli>O fence<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
3-<Deli>O Assign<Deli>O a<Deli>O parking<Deli>O spot<Deli>B-TARGET for<Deli>O visitors<Deli>B-TARGET which<Deli>O would<Deli>O not<Deli>O make<Deli>O them<Deli>O feel<Deli>B-TARGET insulted<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Usually<Deli>O such<Deli>O parking<Deli>O spots<Deli>B-TARGET are<Deli>O on<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O side<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O lot<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Also<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O visitors<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O high<Deli>B-TARGET security<Deli>O clearance<Deli>O should<Deli>O be<Deli>O designated<Deli>B-TARGET parking<Deli>O spots<Deli>B-TARGET inside<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Human<Deli>O protection<Deli>O 
Buses<Deli>O 
Some<Deli>B-TARGET buses<Deli>B-TARGET should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O exposed<Deli>O and<Deli>O others<Deli>B-TARGET should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O camouflaged<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
A<Deli>O :<Deli>O Exposed<Deli>O Busses<Deli>O :<Deli>O One<Deli>B-TARGET at<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O tip<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O road<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
One<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>B-TARGET front<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O buses<Deli>B-TARGET should<Deli>B-TARGET have<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O following<Deli>O :<Deli>O 1-<Deli>O Light<Deli>B-TARGET armor<Deli>O and<Deli>O rocket<Deli>O launchers<Deli>O 2-<Deli>O Wireless<Deli>O equipment<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O report<Deli>B-TARGET dangerous<Deli>B-TARGET activities<Deli>B-TARGET 3-<Deli>O Writing<Deli>O materials<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O jot<Deli>O down<Deli>O suspicious<Deli>B-TARGET activities<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O license<Deli>O plate<Deli>O numbers<Deli>O 4-<Deli>O Sand<Deli>O bags<Deli>O around<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O buses<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O protect<Deli>B-TARGET them<Deli>O from<Deli>O gun<Deli>O fire<Deli>O

These<Deli>O are<Deli>O camouflaged<Deli>O to<Deli>O look<Deli>B-TARGET like<Deli>O commercial<Deli>O companies<Deli>B-TARGET '<Deli>O vehicles<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O traveling<Deli>O salesmen<Deli>B-TARGET 's<Deli>O vehicles<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
They<Deli>O are<Deli>O entrusted<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O task<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O tracking<Deli>B-TARGET down<Deli>O the<Deli>O movement<Deli>O of<Deli>O strangers<Deli>B-TARGET who<Deli>O are<Deli>O approaching<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O objective<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O having<Deli>B-TARGET kiosks<Deli>B-TARGET is<Deli>O they<Deli>O serve<Deli>B-TARGET as<Deli>O communication<Deli>B-TARGET points<Deli>B-TARGET between<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O guards<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O visitors<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O those<Deli>O who<Deli>O are<Deli>O approaching<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O building<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O deal<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O them<Deli>O according<Deli>O to<Deli>O their<Deli>O requirements<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

2-<Deli>O The<Deli>O towers<Deli>B-TARGET should<Deli>B-TARGET be<Deli>O located<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O a<Deli>O manner<Deli>B-TARGET where<Deli>O they<Deli>O can<Deli>O easily<Deli>O communicate<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O one<Deli>O another<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O totally<Deli>O cover<Deli>O the<Deli>O area<Deli>B-TARGET they<Deli>O are<Deli>O guarding<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Outside<Deli>O Patrols<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O locality<Deli>B-TARGET can<Deli>B-TARGET not<Deli>O be<Deli>O fully<Deli>O protected<Deli>B-TARGET without<Deli>O having<Deli>B-TARGET patrols<Deli>O roaming<Deli>B-TARGET on<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O outside<Deli>B-TARGET area<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O fence<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O above<Deli>O mentioned<Deli>B-TARGET protection<Deli>O procedures<Deli>B-TARGET are<Deli>O only<Deli>O for<Deli>O observation<Deli>B-TARGET purposes<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O while<Deli>O patrols<Deli>O check<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O fences<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O barriers<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O towers<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O submit<Deli>B-TARGET periodic<Deli>B-TARGET reports<Deli>B-TARGET on<Deli>O their<Deli>O findings<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
It<Deli>O also<Deli>O checks<Deli>B-TARGET on<Deli>O guard<Deli>O posts<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
They<Deli>O also<Deli>O engage<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O persons<Deli>B-TARGET approaching<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O locality<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O support<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O guards<Deli>O in<Deli>O their<Deli>O duties<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

These<Deli>O patrols<Deli>O are<Deli>O formed<Deli>B-TARGET as<Deli>O follows<Deli>O :<Deli>O 1-<Deli>O Single<Deli>B-TARGET patrols<Deli>O which<Deli>O consist<Deli>O of<Deli>O two<Deli>B-TARGET people<Deli>B-TARGET checking<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O outside<Deli>B-TARGET area<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET 2-<Deli>O Common<Deli>O patrols<Deli>O which<Deli>O consist<Deli>O of<Deli>O one<Deli>B-TARGET man<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O a<Deli>O dog<Deli>O ,<Deli>O also<Deli>O checking<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O outside<Deli>B-TARGET area<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O location<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
These<Deli>O patrols<Deli>O tour<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O area<Deli>B-TARGET during<Deli>O specific<Deli>O times<Deli>O such<Deli>O as<Deli>O ,<Deli>O dinner<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O dawn,<Deli>O dusk<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O midnight<Deli>B-TARGET

This<Deli>O is<Deli>O an<Deli>O employment<Deli>O contract<Deli>B-TARGET between<Deli>B-TARGET AL<Deli>O QAEDA<Deli>O and<Deli>O a<Deli>O potential<Deli>O recruit<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
It<Deli>O contains<Deli>B-TARGET a<Deli>O definition<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O AL<Deli>O QAEDA<Deli>O organization<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O six<Deli>B-TARGET main<Deli>B-TARGET points<Deli>O :<Deli>O 1-Duties<Deli>O ;<Deli>O 2-Holidays<Deli>O ;<Deli>O 3-Salaries<Deli>O and<Deli>O Travel<Deli>O tickets<Deli>O ;<Deli>O 4-Advice<Deli>O ;<Deli>O 5-Reward<Deli>O and<Deli>O Punishment<Deli>B-TARGET ;<Deli>O 6-Pledge<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O the<Deli>O name<Deli>O of<Deli>O Allah<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Most<Deli>O Gracious<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O Most<Deli>O Merciful<Deli>O .<Deli>O (<Deli>O T.C<Deli>O :<Deli>O verse<Deli>O from<Deli>O the<Deli>O Koran<Deli>O )<Deli>O 
AL<Deli>O QAEDA<Deli>O :<Deli>O An<Deli>O Islamic<Deli>O group<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O an<Deli>O aim<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O Jihad<Deli>O .<Deli>O

A-<Deli>O Maintain<Deli>O provision<Deli>O of<Deli>O legitimate<Deli>O justice<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O justice<Deli>O is<Deli>O the<Deli>O establishing<Deli>O the<Deli>O human<Deli>O 's<Deli>O behavior<Deli>O in<Deli>O religion<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Six<Deli>O :<Deli>O The<Deli>O pledge<Deli>O 
Its<Deli>O legitimacy<Deli>O and<Deli>O its<Deli>O purpose:<Deli>O

Defining<Deli>O Terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET 
Before<Deli>B-TARGET assessing<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O threat<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O CBW<Deli>O terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O we<Deli>O need<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O define<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O word<Deli>B-TARGET ``<Deli>O terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O ''<Deli>O 
For<Deli>O political<Deli>O reasons<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O no<Deli>O single<Deli>B-TARGET definition<Deli>B-TARGET has<Deli>O been<Deli>O accepted<Deli>B-TARGET worldwide<Deli>O and<Deli>O several<Deli>B-TARGET different<Deli>B-TARGET ones<Deli>O are<Deli>O in<Deli>O current<Deli>O use<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>O Federal<Deli>O Bureau<Deli>O of<Deli>O Investigation<Deli>O (<Deli>O FBI<Deli>O )<Deli>O defines<Deli>B-TARGET terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET as<Deli>O :<Deli>O ``<Deli>O The<Deli>O unlawful<Deli>B-TARGET use<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O force<Deli>O and<Deli>O violence<Deli>O against<Deli>O persons<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O property<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O intimidate<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O coerce<Deli>O a<Deli>O government<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O civilian<Deli>O population<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O or<Deli>O any<Deli>O segment<Deli>B-TARGET thereof<Deli>O ,<Deli>O in<Deli>O furtherance<Deli>O of<Deli>O political<Deli>O or<Deli>O social<Deli>O objectives<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O ''<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>O State<Deli>O Department<Deli>O defines<Deli>B-TARGET terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET differently<Deli>O ,<Deli>O as<Deli>O :<Deli>O ``<Deli>O Premeditated<Deli>O ,<Deli>O politically<Deli>O motivated<Deli>O violence<Deli>O perpetrated<Deli>B-TARGET against<Deli>O noncombatant<Deli>O targets<Deli>O by<Deli>O sub<Deli>O -<Deli>O national<Deli>B-TARGET groups<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O clandestine<Deli>B-TARGET agents<Deli>O ,<Deli>O usually<Deli>O intended<Deli>O to<Deli>O influence<Deli>B-TARGET an<Deli>O audience<Deli>O .<Deli>O ''<Deli>O 
Terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET experts<Deli>B-TARGET outside<Deli>O government<Deli>B-TARGET have<Deli>O also<Deli>O developed<Deli>B-TARGET their<Deli>O own<Deli>O definitions<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
For<Deli>O example<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O Walter<Deli>O Laqueur<Deli>O ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET specialist<Deli>B-TARGET at<Deli>O the<Deli>O Center<Deli>O for<Deli>O Strategic<Deli>O and<Deli>O International<Deli>O Studies<Deli>O in<Deli>B-TARGET Washington,<Deli>O D.C.<Deli>O ,<Deli>O defines<Deli>B-TARGET terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET as<Deli>O :<Deli>O ``<Deli>O The<Deli>O sub<Deli>O -<Deli>O state<Deli>O application<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O violence<Deli>O or<Deli>O threatened<Deli>O violence<Deli>O intended<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O sow<Deli>B-TARGET panic<Deli>O in<Deli>B-TARGET a<Deli>O society<Deli>O ,<Deli>O to<Deli>O weaken<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O even<Deli>O overthrow<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O incumbents<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O to<Deli>O bring<Deli>B-TARGET about<Deli>O political<Deli>O change<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O ''<Deli>O 
Some<Deli>O definitions<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET go<Deli>O beyond<Deli>O sub<Deli>O -<Deli>O state<Deli>B-TARGET actors<Deli>O to<Deli>O include<Deli>B-TARGET repressive<Deli>O governments<Deli>B-TARGET that<Deli>O may<Deli>O carry<Deli>B-TARGET out<Deli>O acts<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O ``<Deli>O state<Deli>B-TARGET terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET ''<Deli>O against<Deli>O their<Deli>O own<Deli>O citizens<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O lack<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O a<Deli>O universally<Deli>O accepted<Deli>O definition<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET has<Deli>O allowed<Deli>O political<Deli>O leaders<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O manipulate<Deli>O the<Deli>O term<Deli>B-TARGET for<Deli>O propaganda<Deli>O purposes<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

For<Deli>O the<Deli>O purposes<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O this<Deli>O tutorial<Deli>O ,<Deli>O however<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O term<Deli>B-TARGET ``<Deli>O terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET ''<Deli>O will<Deli>O be<Deli>O used<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O describe<Deli>B-TARGET acts<Deli>B-TARGET that<Deli>O incorporate<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O following<Deli>O elements<Deli>O :<Deli>O Intentional<Deli>O or<Deli>O threatened<Deli>O violence<Deli>O directed<Deli>O against<Deli>O civilians<Deli>O or<Deli>O noncombatants<Deli>O ;<Deli>O Actors<Deli>O that<Deli>O are<Deli>O sub<Deli>O -<Deli>O national<Deli>B-TARGET groups<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O individuals<Deli>B-TARGET (<Deli>O although<Deli>O they<Deli>O may<Deli>O receive<Deli>B-TARGET financial<Deli>O or<Deli>O logistical<Deli>O support<Deli>O from<Deli>O governments<Deli>B-TARGET )<Deli>O ;<Deli>O Motivations<Deli>B-TARGET that<Deli>O are<Deli>O chiefly<Deli>O political<Deli>O ,<Deli>O ideological<Deli>O ,<Deli>O or<Deli>O religious<Deli>O (<Deli>O i.e.<Deli>O ,<Deli>O not<Deli>O strictly<Deli>O criminal<Deli>O )<Deli>O ;<Deli>O Often<Deli>O ,<Deli>O some<Deli>O element<Deli>O of<Deli>O symbolism<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O choice<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O target<Deli>O ,<Deli>O together<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O desire<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O elicit<Deli>B-TARGET fear<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O larger<Deli>B-TARGET audience<Deli>O beyond<Deli>O the<Deli>O immediate<Deli>O victims<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O an<Deli>O attack<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Differences<Deli>B-TARGET between<Deli>O Chemical<Deli>O and<Deli>O Biological<Deli>O Weapons<Deli>B-TARGET 
In<Deli>O discussing<Deli>B-TARGET CBW<Deli>O terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O it<Deli>O is<Deli>O important<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O distinguish<Deli>B-TARGET between<Deli>O terrorist<Deli>B-TARGET attacks<Deli>B-TARGET involving<Deli>O chemical<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O biological<Deli>B-TARGET warfare<Deli>B-TARGET agents<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O differ<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O several<Deli>B-TARGET ways:<Deli>O 
Chemical<Deli>O warfare<Deli>B-TARGET (<Deli>O CW<Deli>B-TARGET )<Deli>O agents<Deli>B-TARGET are<Deli>O non-living<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O manufactured<Deli>B-TARGET chemicals<Deli>B-TARGET that<Deli>O are<Deli>O highly<Deli>O toxic<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O can<Deli>B-TARGET enter<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O body<Deli>B-TARGET through<Deli>O the<Deli>O lungs<Deli>O or<Deli>O the<Deli>O skin<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
They<Deli>O cause<Deli>B-TARGET illness<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O death<Deli>B-TARGET within<Deli>O minutes<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O hours<Deli>B-TARGET after<Deli>B-TARGET exposure<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Biological<Deli>B-TARGET warfare<Deli>B-TARGET (<Deli>O BW<Deli>B-TARGET )<Deli>O agents<Deli>B-TARGET are<Deli>O microorganisms<Deli>O such<Deli>O as<Deli>O viruses<Deli>O and<Deli>O bacteria<Deli>O that<Deli>O infect<Deli>O humans<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O livestock<Deli>O ,<Deli>O or<Deli>O crops<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O cause<Deli>B-TARGET an<Deli>O incapacitating<Deli>O or<Deli>O fatal<Deli>B-TARGET disease<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Symptoms<Deli>O of<Deli>O illness<Deli>B-TARGET do<Deli>O not<Deli>O appear<Deli>B-TARGET immediately<Deli>O but<Deli>O only<Deli>O after<Deli>B-TARGET a<Deli>O delay<Deli>O ,<Deli>O or<Deli>O ``<Deli>O incubation<Deli>O period<Deli>O ,<Deli>O ''<Deli>O that<Deli>O may<Deli>O last<Deli>O for<Deli>O days<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O weeks<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Toxins<Deli>B-TARGET --<Deli>O nonliving<Deli>O poisons<Deli>B-TARGET produced<Deli>B-TARGET by<Deli>O living<Deli>B-TARGET plants<Deli>O ,<Deli>O insects<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O animals<Deli>O --<Deli>O are<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O gray<Deli>O area<Deli>O between<Deli>O CW<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O BW<Deli>B-TARGET agents<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Motivation<Deli>B-TARGET

Religious<Deli>O Terrorism<Deli>B-TARGET 
Whereas<Deli>O most<Deli>O terrorist<Deli>B-TARGET groups<Deli>B-TARGET during<Deli>O the<Deli>O 1960s<Deli>O and<Deli>O 1970s<Deli>O were<Deli>O motivated<Deli>B-TARGET either<Deli>O by<Deli>O left-wing<Deli>O ideology<Deli>O (<Deli>O socialist<Deli>O /<Deli>O communist<Deli>O policies<Deli>O advocated<Deli>O by<Deli>O Marxist<Deli>O -<Deli>O Leninist<Deli>O or<Deli>O Maoist<Deli>O groups<Deli>B-TARGET )<Deli>O or<Deli>O by<Deli>O national<Deli>B-TARGET -<Deli>O separatist<Deli>O goals<Deli>B-TARGET (<Deli>O a<Deli>O group<Deli>B-TARGET 's<Deli>O pursuit<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O become<Deli>B-TARGET an<Deli>O independent<Deli>O state<Deli>B-TARGET based<Deli>O on<Deli>O its<Deli>O ethnic<Deli>O ,<Deli>O racial<Deli>O ,<Deli>O or<Deli>O cultural<Deli>O make-up<Deli>O )<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O number<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O groups<Deli>B-TARGET characterized<Deli>B-TARGET primarily<Deli>O by<Deli>O religious<Deli>O beliefs<Deli>B-TARGET began<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O increase<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O the<Deli>O 1980s<Deli>O .<Deli>O

By<Deli>O 1995<Deli>O ,<Deli>O however<Deli>O ,<Deli>O 26<Deli>O out<Deli>O of<Deli>O 56<Deli>O known<Deli>O ,<Deli>O active<Deli>B-TARGET international<Deli>B-TARGET terrorist<Deli>B-TARGET groups<Deli>B-TARGET could<Deli>O be<Deli>O classified<Deli>B-TARGET as<Deli>O religious<Deli>O in<Deli>O character<Deli>O and<Deli>O /<Deli>O or<Deli>O motivation<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Agricultural<Deli>O Biotechnology<Deli>O :<Deli>O

In<Deli>O this<Deli>O field<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O Iran<Deli>O 's<Deli>O research<Deli>B-TARGET is<Deli>O concentrated<Deli>O in<Deli>O creating<Deli>B-TARGET genes<Deli>O that<Deli>O produce<Deli>B-TARGET toxins<Deli>O against<Deli>O insect<Deli>O pests<Deli>O ;<Deli>O improving<Deli>O the<Deli>O biological<Deli>B-TARGET resistance<Deli>O of<Deli>O plants<Deli>O ;<Deli>O formulating<Deli>B-TARGET new<Deli>B-TARGET pesticides<Deli>O ;<Deli>O improving<Deli>O techniques<Deli>O of<Deli>O spraying<Deli>B-TARGET or<Deli>O otherwise<Deli>O disseminating<Deli>B-TARGET pesticides<Deli>O ;<Deli>O investigating<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O effects<Deli>B-TARGET on<Deli>O native<Deli>O plant<Deli>O species<Deli>O after<Deli>O they<Deli>O have<Deli>O been<Deli>O introduced<Deli>O to<Deli>O various<Deli>O pests<Deli>O and<Deli>O diseases<Deli>B-TARGET ;<Deli>O preventing<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O production<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O mycotoxins<Deli>O in<Deli>O crops<Deli>B-TARGET ;<Deli>O producing<Deli>B-TARGET plant<Deli>O viruses<Deli>O and<Deli>O their<Deli>O corresponding<Deli>O antiserums<Deli>O for<Deli>O an<Deli>O antiserum<Deli>O bank<Deli>O ;<Deli>O and<Deli>O manufacturing<Deli>B-TARGET pheromones<Deli>O and<Deli>O hormones<Deli>O to<Deli>O combat<Deli>O arthropods<Deli>O that<Deli>O harm<Deli>O Iran<Deli>O 's<Deli>O agricultural<Deli>O industry<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
All<Deli>O of<Deli>O these<Deli>O research<Deli>B-TARGET areas<Deli>O have<Deli>B-TARGET legitimate<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O important<Deli>B-TARGET uses<Deli>B-TARGET for<Deli>O improving<Deli>O crop<Deli>B-TARGET yields<Deli>O and<Deli>O reducing<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O threat<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O Iran<Deli>O 's<Deli>O agricultural<Deli>O industry<Deli>B-TARGET posed<Deli>O by<Deli>O pests<Deli>O and<Deli>O disease<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Genetic<Deli>O Engineering<Deli>O and<Deli>O Vaccine<Deli>O Production<Deli>O :<Deli>O

Overview<Deli>O 
Being<Deli>O one<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O few<Deli>O countries<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O the<Deli>O world<Deli>B-TARGET that<Deli>O has<Deli>O experienced<Deli>O chemical<Deli>B-TARGET warfare<Deli>B-TARGET (<Deli>O CW<Deli>O )<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O battlefield<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Iran<Deli>O ratified<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O Chemical<Deli>O Weapons<Deli>O Convention<Deli>O in<Deli>O 1997<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Iranian<Deli>B-TARGET troops<Deli>O suffered<Deli>B-TARGET tens<Deli>O of<Deli>O thousands<Deli>O of<Deli>O casualties<Deli>O from<Deli>O Iraqi<Deli>B-TARGET chemical<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O during<Deli>O the<Deli>O 1980<Deli>O -<Deli>O 88<Deli>O Iran<Deli>O -<Deli>O Iraq<Deli>O War<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

However<Deli>O ,<Deli>O despite<Deli>O such<Deli>O rhetoric<Deli>O ,<Deli>O several<Deli>O Western<Deli>O officials<Deli>B-TARGET accuse<Deli>B-TARGET Iran<Deli>O of<Deli>O developing<Deli>B-TARGET similar<Deli>B-TARGET offensive<Deli>O CW<Deli>B-TARGET capabilities<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O Atomic<Deli>O Energy<Deli>O Organization<Deli>O of<Deli>O Iran<Deli>O (<Deli>O AEOI<Deli>O )<Deli>O is<Deli>O the<Deli>O government<Deli>B-TARGET agency<Deli>O that<Deli>O oversees<Deli>O Iran<Deli>O 's<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>O program<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O is<Deli>O one<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O few<Deli>B-TARGET agencies<Deli>O in<Deli>O Iran<Deli>O that<Deli>O reports<Deli>B-TARGET directly<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O president<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

It<Deli>O does<Deli>B-TARGET so<Deli>O by<Deli>O coordinating<Deli>O activities<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O several<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>O research<Deli>B-TARGET centers<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O most<Deli>O notably<Deli>O the<Deli>O TNRC<Deli>O and<Deli>O ENTC<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Introduction<Deli>O 
Kazakhstan<Deli>O inherited<Deli>O nuclear-tipped<Deli>O missiles<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>O weapon<Deli>O test<Deli>B-TARGET site<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O biological<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O chemical<Deli>O weapon<Deli>O production<Deli>B-TARGET facilities<Deli>B-TARGET when<Deli>O the<Deli>O Soviet<Deli>O Union<Deli>O collapsed<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O its<Deli>O first<Deli>B-TARGET decade<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O independence<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Kazakhstan<Deli>O dismantled<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O destroyed<Deli>B-TARGET Soviet<Deli>O weapons<Deli>B-TARGET systems<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O facilities<Deli>B-TARGET left<Deli>O on<Deli>O its<Deli>O territory<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O signed<Deli>B-TARGET several<Deli>B-TARGET international<Deli>B-TARGET nonproliferation<Deli>O treaties<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Biological<Deli>O

Kazakhstani<Deli>O President<Deli>B-TARGET Nazarbayev<Deli>O ,<Deli>O however<Deli>O ,<Deli>O has<Deli>O declared<Deli>B-TARGET Kazakhstan<Deli>O 's<Deli>O commitment<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O the<Deli>O nonproliferation<Deli>O of<Deli>O BW<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O associated<Deli>B-TARGET technologies<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Kazakhstan<Deli>O inherited<Deli>O one<Deli>O known<Deli>B-TARGET chemical<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O (<Deli>O CW<Deli>O )<Deli>O production<Deli>B-TARGET plant<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O city<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O Pavlodar<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
This<Deli>O plant<Deli>B-TARGET probably<Deli>B-TARGET was<Deli>O designed<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O replace<Deli>B-TARGET aging<Deli>O plants<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>B-TARGET Volgograd<Deli>O and<Deli>O Novocheboksarsk<Deli>O (<Deli>O Russia<Deli>O )<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O production<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O binary<Deli>O agent<Deli>B-TARGET ``<Deli>O novichok<Deli>O .''<Deli>O

Kazakhstan<Deli>O inherited<Deli>O 104<Deli>O SS-18<Deli>O intercontinental<Deli>B-TARGET ballistic<Deli>O missiles<Deli>O (<Deli>O ICBMs<Deli>O )<Deli>O from<Deli>O the<Deli>O Soviet<Deli>O missile<Deli>B-TARGET complex<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Gidromash<Deli>O ,<Deli>O an<Deli>O Almaty<Deli>O -based<Deli>O Soviet-era<Deli>O producer<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O submarine-launched<Deli>O missiles<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O was<Deli>O converted<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O a<Deli>O civilian<Deli>O commercial<Deli>O enterprise<Deli>O under<Deli>O CTR<Deli>O 's<Deli>O Industrial<Deli>O Partnerships<Deli>O Program<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Updated<Deli>O April<Deli>O 2004<Deli>O 
Introduction<Deli>O 
Libya<Deli>O has<Deli>O shown<Deli>O interest<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O and<Deli>O taken<Deli>O steps<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O acquire<Deli>B-TARGET weapons<Deli>O of<Deli>O mass<Deli>O destruction<Deli>O (<Deli>O WMD<Deli>O )<Deli>O and<Deli>O their<Deli>O delivery<Deli>O systems<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Indeed<Deli>O ,<Deli>O it<Deli>O is<Deli>O one<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O few<Deli>O states<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O have<Deli>O employed<Deli>B-TARGET chemical<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O conflict<Deli>B-TARGET (<Deli>O Chad<Deli>O ,<Deli>O 1987<Deli>O )<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Chemical<Deli>O Overview<Deli>O 
This<Deli>O assessment<Deli>B-TARGET ranks<Deli>B-TARGET North<Deli>O Korea<Deli>O among<Deli>O the<Deli>O largest<Deli>O possessors<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O chemical<Deli>B-TARGET weaponry<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O the<Deli>O world<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
If<Deli>O official<Deli>O reports<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O testimonies<Deli>B-TARGET from<Deli>O North<Deli>O Korean<Deli>O defectors<Deli>O are<Deli>O to<Deli>O be<Deli>O believed<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O DPRK<Deli>O military<Deli>B-TARGET possesses<Deli>B-TARGET between<Deli>O 2,500<Deli>O and<Deli>O 5,000<Deli>O tons<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O chemical<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O .<Deli>O

During<Deli>O the<Deli>O three<Deli>O decades<Deli>B-TARGET after<Deli>O the<Deli>O establishment<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O DPRK<Deli>O (<Deli>O in<Deli>O 1947<Deli>O )<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O North<Deli>O Korean<Deli>O CW<Deli>O program<Deli>B-TARGET had<Deli>O uneven<Deli>O success<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O obtaining<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O weaponizing<Deli>B-TARGET CW<Deli>O agents<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Background<Deli>O 
As<Deli>O early<Deli>O as<Deli>O 1947<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O KPA<Deli>O manual<Deli>B-TARGET addressed<Deli>B-TARGET at<Deli>O least<Deli>O the<Deli>O theory<Deli>O of<Deli>O CW<Deli>O operational<Deli>B-TARGET doctrine<Deli>O .<Deli>O

CW<Deli>O Agents<Deli>O

A<Deli>O 1999<Deli>O report<Deli>B-TARGET by<Deli>O the<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>O Congress<Deli>O stated<Deli>B-TARGET the<Deli>O following<Deli>O with<Deli>O regard<Deli>O to<Deli>O how<Deli>O the<Deli>O North<Deli>O Korean<Deli>O military<Deli>B-TARGET views<Deli>B-TARGET chemical<Deli>B-TARGET weaponry<Deli>B-TARGET :<Deli>O 
Reflecting<Deli>O Soviet<Deli>O military<Deli>B-TARGET doctrine<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O DPRK<Deli>O has<Deli>O traditionally<Deli>O viewed<Deli>B-TARGET chemical<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O as<Deli>O an<Deli>O integral<Deli>O part<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O any<Deli>O military<Deli>B-TARGET offensive<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Nuclear<Deli>B-TARGET Capabilities<Deli>O 
Methodology<Deli>O 
Countries<Deli>B-TARGET developing<Deli>B-TARGET clandestine<Deli>B-TARGET nuclear<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O programs<Deli>B-TARGET usually<Deli>O go<Deli>O to<Deli>O great<Deli>O lengths<Deli>O to<Deli>O conceal<Deli>O information<Deli>B-TARGET about<Deli>O these<Deli>O programs<Deli>B-TARGET from<Deli>O the<Deli>O outside<Deli>B-TARGET world<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Nuclear<Deli>B-TARGET Overview<Deli>O 
North<Deli>O Korea<Deli>O has<Deli>O joined<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O violated<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O withdrawn<Deli>B-TARGET from<Deli>O the<Deli>O Nuclear<Deli>O Non<Deli>O -<Deli>O Proliferation<Deli>O Treaty<Deli>O (<Deli>O NPT<Deli>O )<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O course<Deli>O of<Deli>O activities<Deli>B-TARGET apparently<Deli>O dedicated<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O production<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
On<Deli>O 23<Deli>O April<Deli>O 2003<Deli>O in<Deli>O Beijing<Deli>O ,<Deli>O North<Deli>O Korean<Deli>O Deputy<Deli>O Foreign<Deli>O Minster<Deli>O Li<Deli>O Gun<Deli>O (<Deli>O Lee<Deli>O Gu<Deli>O (<Deli>O n<Deli>O )<Deli>O reportedly<Deli>B-TARGET told<Deli>B-TARGET U.S.<Deli>O Assistant<Deli>O Secretary<Deli>O for<Deli>O East<Deli>O Asian<Deli>O and<Deli>O Pacific<Deli>O Affairs<Deli>O James<Deli>O Kelly<Deli>O that<Deli>O North<Deli>O Korea<Deli>O possesses<Deli>B-TARGET nuclear<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Li<Deli>O made<Deli>O the<Deli>O statement<Deli>B-TARGET during<Deli>O trilateral<Deli>O talks<Deli>B-TARGET between<Deli>O delegations<Deli>O from<Deli>O the<Deli>O United<Deli>O States<Deli>O ,<Deli>O China<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O North<Deli>O Korea<Deli>O .<Deli>O

On<Deli>O 12<Deli>O May<Deli>O 2003<Deli>O ,<Deli>O North<Deli>O Korea<Deli>O announced<Deli>B-TARGET that<Deli>O the<Deli>O bilateral<Deli>O ``<Deli>O Joint<Deli>O Declaration<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O Denuclearization<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O Korean<Deli>O Peninsula<Deli>O ''<Deli>O signed<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O South<Deli>O Korea<Deli>O on<Deli>O 20<Deli>O January<Deli>O 1992<Deli>O was<Deli>O no<Deli>O longer<Deli>O valid<Deli>B-TARGET because<Deli>O of<Deli>O ``<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>O actions<Deli>B-TARGET ''<Deli>O [<Deli>O Note<Deli>O :<Deli>O the<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>O was<Deli>O not<Deli>O a<Deli>O signatory<Deli>B-TARGET ]<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Nuclear<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O Soviet<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>O weapon<Deli>O program<Deli>B-TARGET began<Deli>B-TARGET during<Deli>O World<Deli>O War<Deli>O II<Deli>O and<Deli>O culminated<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O successful<Deli>B-TARGET atomic<Deli>O bomb<Deli>O test<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O 1949<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Russia<Deli>O ,<Deli>O as<Deli>O the<Deli>O successor<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O Soviet<Deli>O Union<Deli>O ,<Deli>O is<Deli>O a<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>O weapon<Deli>O state<Deli>B-TARGET party<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O Non<Deli>O -<Deli>O Proliferation<Deli>O Treaty<Deli>O (<Deli>O NPT<Deli>O )<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Introduction<Deli>O 
South<Deli>O Africa<Deli>O 's<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>O ,<Deli>O biological<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O chemical<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O missile<Deli>B-TARGET programs<Deli>B-TARGET reflected<Deli>O perceptions<Deli>O of<Deli>O internal<Deli>O and<Deli>O external<Deli>O threats<Deli>O stemming<Deli>O from<Deli>O its<Deli>O former<Deli>O government<Deli>B-TARGET 's<Deli>O policy<Deli>O of<Deli>O apartheid<Deli>O ,<Deli>O as<Deli>O well<Deli>O as<Deli>O the<Deli>O country<Deli>B-TARGET 's<Deli>O advanced<Deli>O state<Deli>O of<Deli>O technical<Deli>O development<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Pretoria<Deli>O developed<Deli>B-TARGET nuclear<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O and<Deli>O ballistic<Deli>O missiles<Deli>O but<Deli>O relinquished<Deli>B-TARGET these<Deli>O armaments<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O early<Deli>B-TARGET 1990s<Deli>O .<Deli>O

While<Deli>O the<Deli>O proliferation<Deli>B-TARGET legacies<Deli>O of<Deli>O South<Deli>O Africa<Deli>O 's<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>O and<Deli>O missile<Deli>B-TARGET programs<Deli>B-TARGET were<Deli>O effectively<Deli>O resolved<Deli>B-TARGET through<Deli>O verified<Deli>B-TARGET disarmament<Deli>B-TARGET measures<Deli>B-TARGET that<Deli>O won<Deli>O international<Deli>B-TARGET acclaim<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O dismantlement<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O the<Deli>O country<Deli>B-TARGET 's<Deli>O CBW<Deli>O capabilities<Deli>B-TARGET was<Deli>O not<Deli>O verified<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O a<Deli>O comparable<Deli>B-TARGET degree<Deli>O of<Deli>O certainty<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O post<Deli>O -<Deli>O apartheid<Deli>O government<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O South<Deli>O Africa<Deli>O implemented<Deli>B-TARGET its<Deli>O nonproliferation<Deli>O and<Deli>O disarmament<Deli>B-TARGET policy<Deli>O through<Deli>O the<Deli>O Non<Deli>O -<Deli>O Proliferation<Deli>O of<Deli>O Weapons<Deli>O of<Deli>O Mass<Deli>O Destruction<Deli>O Act<Deli>O (<Deli>O No.<Deli>O 87<Deli>O of<Deli>O 1993<Deli>O )<Deli>O to<Deli>O control<Deli>O the<Deli>O transfer<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O sensitive<Deli>O items<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O technologies<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
South<Deli>O Africa<Deli>O is<Deli>O the<Deli>O first<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O ,<Deli>O to<Deli>O date<Deli>O ,<Deli>O only<Deli>B-TARGET country<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O build<Deli>B-TARGET a<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>B-TARGET arsenal<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O then<Deli>O voluntarily<Deli>O dismantle<Deli>B-TARGET its<Deli>O entire<Deli>B-TARGET nuclear<Deli>B-TARGET weapons<Deli>O program<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O South<Deli>O African<Deli>O experience<Deli>O demonstrates<Deli>B-TARGET that<Deli>O at<Deli>O least<Deli>O under<Deli>O some<Deli>O conditions<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O unilateral<Deli>O disarmament<Deli>B-TARGET is<Deli>O not<Deli>O only<Deli>O possible<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O but<Deli>O can<Deli>B-TARGET improve<Deli>O a<Deli>O nation<Deli>B-TARGET 's<Deli>O security<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Nuclear<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O the<Deli>O 1960s<Deli>O ,<Deli>O South<Deli>O Africa<Deli>O began<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O explore<Deli>O the<Deli>O technical<Deli>O utility<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O ``<Deli>O peaceful<Deli>O nuclear<Deli>O explosions<Deli>O ''<Deli>O for<Deli>O mining<Deli>O and<Deli>O engineering<Deli>O purposes<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

History<Deli>O

The<Deli>O Cyclon-30<Deli>O cyclotron<Deli>O ,<Deli>O provided<Deli>B-TARGET by<Deli>O Belgium<Deli>O 's<Deli>O Ion<Deli>O Beam<Deli>O Applications<Deli>O ,<Deli>O is<Deli>O the<Deli>O same<Deli>B-TARGET model<Deli>O as<Deli>O the<Deli>O cyclotron<Deli>O in<Deli>B-TARGET Iran<Deli>O ,<Deli>O where<Deli>O it<Deli>O is<Deli>O suspected<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O being<Deli>O used<Deli>B-TARGET to<Deli>O enrich<Deli>B-TARGET uranium<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O facility<Deli>B-TARGET 's<Deli>O status<Deli>O is<Deli>O unknown<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Taiwan<Deli>O Overview<Deli>O :<Deli>O

Taiwan<Deli>O does<Deli>O not<Deli>O possess<Deli>B-TARGET nuclear<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O ,<Deli>O but<Deli>O began<Deli>B-TARGET a<Deli>O covert<Deli>B-TARGET nuclear<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O program<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O 1964<Deli>O that<Deli>O ended<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O 1988<Deli>O as<Deli>O a<Deli>O result<Deli>O of<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>O pressure<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

In<Deli>O 1989<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>O Congress<Deli>O was<Deli>O informed<Deli>B-TARGET that<Deli>O Taiwan<Deli>O could<Deli>O have<Deli>O acquired<Deli>B-TARGET an<Deli>O offensive<Deli>B-TARGET chemical<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O (<Deli>O CW<Deli>B-TARGET )<Deli>O capability<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

These<Deli>O systems<Deli>B-TARGET have<Deli>O provided<Deli>B-TARGET Taiwanese<Deli>O scientists<Deli>B-TARGET with<Deli>O experience<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O a<Deli>O technological<Deli>O base<Deli>B-TARGET in<Deli>O areas<Deli>O such<Deli>O as<Deli>O composite<Deli>O materials<Deli>B-TARGET and<Deli>O guidance<Deli>O and<Deli>O fire<Deli>O control<Deli>O systems<Deli>B-TARGET ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O are<Deli>O essential<Deli>B-TARGET for<Deli>O development<Deli>B-TARGET of<Deli>O longer<Deli>O range<Deli>B-TARGET surface<Deli>O -to<Deli>O -<Deli>O surface<Deli>O missiles<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O 
Taiwan<Deli>O has<Deli>B-TARGET two<Deli>B-TARGET SRBM<Deli>O programs<Deli>B-TARGET .<Deli>O

Abstract:<Deli>O
